fracture.translation[0].definitions[0].d: if a bone or other hard substance fractures, or if it is fractured, it breaks or cracks
fracture.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The immense pressure causes the rock to fracture.
He fractured his right leg during training.
fracture.translation[0].definitions[1].d: if a group, country etc fractures, or if it is fractured, it divides into parts in an unfriendly way because of disagreement
fracture.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The opposition has been fractured by bitter disputes.
fracture.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a crack or broken part in a bone or other hard substance
fracture.translation[1].definitions[0].e: a stress fracture in his left knee
